survey_name: Corporate Carbon Footprint Reduction Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on corporate sustainability initiatives and identify areas for improvement in reducing the company's carbon footprint.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with our company's current carbon footprint reduction initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale for better clarity and avoid neutral middle options.
